tool_description: Validates transaction records for completeness, accuracy, and potential anomalies such as duplicate entries, unusual amounts, or suspicious patterns.

transactions.description: Array of transaction records to validate

validation_rules.description: Specific validation rules to apply: completeness, amount_range, date_validity, duplicate_check

amount_threshold.description: Flag transactions above this amount as potentially unusual

date_range_days.description: Flag transactions outside this many days from today as potentially outdated

error_messages: Empty transaction list: Provide at least one transaction for validation.
Invalid validation rule: Use combinations of [completeness, amount_range, date_validity, duplicate_check].
Invalid amount threshold: Threshold must be a positive number.
Invalid date range: Date range days must be a positive integer.
usage: Provide transaction records and optionally specify validation rules, amount threshold, and date range. The tool will identify and flag transactions that require attention or correction.

valid_transactions.description: Array of transactions that passed all validation checks

flagged_transactions.description: Array of transactions that failed validation with reason codes

validation_errors.description: Array of specific validation error descriptions
